talk.utter: I had covid, 6 months after my symptom began following vaccination.  I was nucleocapsid negative at onset of symptoms.  People developed the same issues from other illnesses before covid.  Itâ€™s the immune response not the virus per se. As the ME article I linked suggests.

talk.utter: I'm not understanding what you're trying to get at then. Your original comments makes it seem like you blame the vaccine, but the data you link and the studies around it all blame COVID itself, and not an effect of the vaccine.
